snippet: Online book retailer Amazon.com Inc said on Monday it has signed a multi-year deal with Simon & Schuster Inc, the second Big-Five book publisher, on the future price of e-books....

headline.print_headline: Amazon Strikes Deal With Simon & Schuster on e-Book Prices
headline.main: Amazon Strikes Deal With Simon & Schuster on e-Book Prices

lead_paragraph: Online book retailer Amazon.com Inc said on Monday it has signed a multi-year deal with Simon & Schuster Inc, the second Big-Five book publisher, on the future price of e-books.
